config.title: Weather Settings
config.description: Sign up for a Pirate Weather API key at https://pirateweather.net/en/latest/ and set the latitude/longitude to the location you want to monitor. Weather alerts come from Meteoalarm; choose the country feed from https://feeds.meteoalarm.org and use its area descriptors for optional regional filtering.

fields.label: API Key
fields.description: Token from your Pirate Weather dashboard (https://pirate-weather.apiable.io/login).

fields.label: Latitude
fields.description: Latitude for the location you want to display (decimal format, e.g., 56.0).

fields.label: Longitude
fields.description: Longitude for the same location (decimal format, e.g., -3.2).

fields.label: Alerts Country
fields.description: Country segment from the Meteoalarm feed URL (e.g., united-kingdom for https://feeds.meteoalarm.org/feeds/meteoalarm-legacy-rss-united-kingdom).

fields.label: Alerts Province/Region
fields.description: Optional regional filter using the Meteoalarm alert's area.areaDesc value (e.g., Central, Tayside & Fife). Leave blank to show all alerts for the selected country.
